userSettings.saveSettingsSuccessAlert: Your Settings have been successfully saved.
userSettings.notificationSettingsFilterInfo: These settings also filter the notification sidebar

settingDescriptions.exerciseReleasedDescription: Get notified when a new exercise has been released
settingDescriptions.exerciseOpenForPracticeDescription: Get notified when an exercise has been opened for practice (e.g. Quiz)
settingDescriptions.newPostForExercisesDescription: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
settingDescriptions.newReplyForExercisesDescription: Get notified when a new reply about an exercise has been created
settingDescriptions.attachmentChangesDescription: Receive a notification when an attachment was changed
settingDescriptions.newPostForLectureDescription: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
settingDescriptions.newReplyForLectureDescription: Get notified when a new reply about an exercise has been created
settingDescriptions.courseAndExamArchivingStartedDescription: Receive a notification when the process of archiving a course or exam has been started
